feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network & servers operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 19, 22:00 UTC  -  Oct 20, 04:00 UTC

Oct 5, 00:04 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/10/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 20/10/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Our teams will carry out an update operation on storage equipment. This update will be performed first on the nodes in standby. Once the update is complete, a switchover will be performed to update the remaining devices. Expect a few seconds freeze of the inputs/outputs during the switchover
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment

entry.title: [RBX2B][VMware Private Cloud - Storage] - tete-7707
entry.content:
Oct 7, 04:57 UTC
Resolved - Start time: 07/10/2022 00:12 UTC
End time: 07/10/2022 01:24 UTC
User impact : Access to the ssd-010151 datastore was unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2B
Root cause : A corruption was caused by a hard disk issue.

Our teams replaced the defective hardware.

entry.title: [BHS1C][VMware Private Cloud] - cluster79
entry.content:
Oct 6, 22:15 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 06/10/2022 19:03 UTC
End Time : 06/10/2022 19:17 UTC
Technical impact : The storage of these pools were temporarily unavailable: ssd-004448 ssd-004449 ssd-004450 ssd-004451 ssd-004454 ssd-004458 ssd-004463 ssd-004465 ssd-004466 ssd-004469 ssd-004591 ssd-004887
Root cause : Failover

entry.title: [SBG2][Network] - SecNumCloud - hosts upgrade
entry.content:
Oct 6, 04:15 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/10/2022 01:33 UTC
End time : 06/10/2022 04:09 UTC
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : There was a malfunction on a link.

Oct 6, 03:31 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 06/10/2022 01:33 UTC
Service impact : There is some redundancy of the network cards managment and vrack unreachable on the esxi hosts .
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
